sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col xs12 class="film-column" v-for="film in films" :key="film.id">
        <FilmPage :filmP="film"></FilmPage>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="3" class="film-column" v-for="film in films1" :key="film.id">
        <FilmPage :filmP="film"></FilmPage>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import FilmPage from "./FilmPage.vue";
import {FILMS} from "@/components/DATA/database";

export default {
  name: "RepertoirePage",
  components: { FilmPage },
  data() {
    return {
        films1: FILMS,
      films: [
        {
          id: 1,
          title: "Mamba",
          content: "Horror opowiadajacy o złowrogiej mambie atakujacej ludzi"
        },
        {
          id: 2,
          title: "Samba",
          content: "Film o tańcu"
        },
        {
          id: 3,
          title: "Tico",
          content: "Film o samochodzie"
        },
        {
          id: 4,
          title: "Maxi King",
          content: "Film o batonie"
        },
        {
          id: 5,
          title: "Girls",
          content: "Film o dziewczynach"
        },
        {
          id: 6,
          title: "Mens",
          content: "Film o facetach"
        }
      ]
    };
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.film-column {
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap !important;
}
</style>
